posts.post_title: FS: T202 Young/Kling (Lobert Almost Caught) SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Have a t202 Cy Young/John Kling (Lobert Almosts Caught) for sale.  Card is graded poor by SGC due to 4 very small pinholes.   Asking $200 dlvd in US.  Payment by check, mo, or Paypal gift. Regular Paypal add 3%. First commitment to purchase gets the card.

Any questions, or if you need larger scan please let me know. 
Thanks
